description.raw:
This PR implements the ability to handle different building methods when releasing packages depending on the information provided by the -release repositories. All the information about how to define and use this different methods is in the `debbuild-base.bash.doc.md` file (part of this PR). Backwards compatibility with current branches is preserved, no migration needed.

This allow the mentor project to use the default branches in sdformat3 and gazebo6 and just keep in the mentor branch (see the [mentor2 branch in sdformat](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/sdformat3-release/src/14c48e61c4242b4afd52f9ac3f2b67eeb8967703/?at=mentor2) the changelog and a simple patch, the rest is imported from default branch.

Testing runs:

 * [usual sdformat3 release from default](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/sdformat3-debbuilder_test_metadata_build/3/)
 * [sdformat3 mentor2 branch](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/sdformat3-debbuilder_test_metadata_build/2/)
